channel.title: Help with mining

item.title: Help with mining
item.dc:creator: @Raams Raams
item.description:
@Raams wrote:

[quote=“The Reaper X, post:3, topic:191110”][quote author=Raams link=topic=254712.msg2658006#msg2658006 date=1233994674]
No don’t add that, that would be fore if you click “Use” on an item and use it with a object. Go into your client.java and search for the “1st click on an object” case 132 I believe, if you want to 2nd click on an object it would be in case 252, another way of calling them is “atObject2” or “atObject1” …search those things… you’ll get it.
[/quote]Look at dates before you reply to them.[/quote]

Yeah I know lol but still thought I should help him out if he still doesn’t know and is wondering about this… =/

Read full topic

item.description:
@The_Reaper_X wrote:

[quote=“Raams, post:2, topic:191110”]No don’t add that, that would be fore if you click “Use” on an item and use it with a object. Go into your client.java and search for the “1st click on an object” case 132 I believe, if you want to 2nd click on an object it would be in case 252, another way of calling them is “atObject2” or “atObject1” …search those things… you’ll get it.[/quote]Look at dates before you reply to them.

item.title: Help with mining
item.dc:creator: @Raams Raams
item.description:
@Raams wrote:

No don’t add that, that would be fore if you click “Use” on an item and use it with a object. Go into your client.java and search for the “1st click on an object” case 132 I believe, if you want to 2nd click on an object it would be in case 252, another way of calling them is “atObject2” or “atObject1” …search those things… you’ll get it.

Read full topic

item.title: Help with mining
item.dc:creator: @Marc3239099 Marc3239099
item.description:
@Marc3239099 wrote:

Alright, Im using Dodian why? well, its basicly lagg free Ive done a few updates and added 4 skills which work but I need some help with mining. I went into object.cfg and looked for a mining rock I teled there and it worked so I added this

[code]

public void NewObjects() {
AddGlobalObject(2767, 4835, 2104, -1, 10);
AddGlobalObject(2767, 4836, 2091, -1, 10);
AddGlobalObject(2766, 4838, 2108, -1, 10);
AddGlobalObject(2764, 4836, 2092, -1, 10);
AddGlobalObject(2764, 4837, 2095, -1, 10);

}[/code]

Then in config > objects.cfg I added

object = 2095 2764 4837 1 object = 2092 2763 4839 1 object = 2108 2766 4838 1 object = 2091 2767 4836 1 object = 2104 2767 4835 1

(with correct tabs as it puts all the numbers on code together

i complied no errors RAN and no errors the rocks are there but when you click on then all you do is face them
would I need to add

else if ((itemUsed == 1519) && (useWith == 590)) { if (playerLevel[11] >= 1) { deleteItem(1519, getItemSlot(1519), 1); createNewTileObject(currentX, currentY, 2732, 0, 10); addSkillXP(11000, 11); }
These type of things but with the rune pickaxe and rock id??? im not sure please help me if you know

Read full topic
